title: Crawling

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Devour someone, attacking them.
-Appease your lord, killing yourself but allowing the **Human Insect** to perform their ability twice the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The first time you are attacked, instead you arent and the attacker becomes **Scared**
-Two nights after being converted to this role, you die.
> Scared: Roleblocked for one night and blackmailed for one day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the Human Insect/Insect Abomination wins the game.

desc:
Post 2319B
*Barely alive, brainless, a nightmare for the eyes. Is this really a better fate than death?*
